name: wacky
content:

Add to word list
unusual in a pleasing and exciting or silly way: The book contains some weird and wacky ideas for teaching kids about science. Synonyms
batty informal disapproving
bonkers informal humorous
cockamamie US disapproving or humorous
crackers UK informal
crazy (NOT SENSIBLE)
goofy mainly US informal
kooky mainly US informal
loco mainly US slang
loony informal
